summary: Plugin Loader for my libraries in case you don\'t use SKSE
descriptionHtml:
This utility is a plugin loader based on winmm.dll, it can be used to load the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24239]FPS Counter[/url] and the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23664]Windowed Mode Relocator[/url] in case you don\'t use SKSE.

Installation of the loader is very simple, just manually download the file and copy it inside the Skyrim directory where TESV.exe is located.

Use the Nexus Mod Manager to install the rest of the plugins normally, or download them manually and then copy the files on Data\\SKSE\\Plugins

[b]If you are interested, you can check my other mods.[/b]
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23402]Horse gallop endurance[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23664]Windowed Mode Relocator[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23770]Non Stop Mining And Chopping[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24028]Strong Boxes On Alchemy Labs And Arcane Enchanters[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24239]FPS Counter[/url]
[/list]
Best regards.
author: Pharago
